revised_title: Interfacial Constitutive Equations and Micromechanical Investigation
tldr: This article presents a micromechanical investigation of interfacial transport processes, focusing on the formulation of interfacial constitutive equations. The authors develop a method to derive macroscale interfacial constitutive relations from microscale equations, which can be applied to various interfacial phenomena and help improve our understanding of interfacial transport processes.
